All Classes

Class
Description
AudioLoader
This AudioLoader class is the utility for loading AudioClip by using ClassLoader.getSystemResource() with the file path then store in a public static field.
Book
Book class is a class that tells the player that player can walk through this class' object and you need to collect all of the books to win a level.
BuyItemFailedException
This BuyItemFailedException class extends from Exception.
Character
Character class is an abstract class that extends ImageView.
Coin
Coin class is a class that tells the player that player can walk through this class' object and player's coin will increase.
Collectable
Collectable is a marker interface that tells player and developers which block are collectable
CongratsBox
CongratsBox is a JavaFx StackPane that will be shown when you finish the game.
CSVUtility
This CSVUtility public class is an utility that provides useful static methods for all CSV File management which includes Reading, Writing, Adding, and Sorting File leader-board.csv
Damagable
Damagable is a marker interface that tells player and developers which block can hurt player.
DrawStringUtility
This public class, DrawStringUtility is an utility that provides useful static methods to Draw String on GUI pane and Scene.
EndGameStatBox
This EngGameStatBox is extends from the VBox containing player's stats which are player's name, player's money, player's exp when play completed all the level.
EndingLevelTextBox
EndingLevelTextBox is a JavaFx StackPane that will be shown when a level is ended whether you die, your time is up, you fail a mission, or you complete a level.
EnterNameScene
This public class, EnterNameScene class extends from Scene.
FinishFlag
FinishFlag class is a class that tells the player that player can walk through this class' object.
FontLoader
This FontLoader class is for setting font for GUI components, MainButton, Label, and TextField
FontType
FontType enum class represents all the font that presents in this application.
GameHUD
This GameHUD class extends HBox is a gameHUD presents in the GameScene UIRoot.
GameManager
GameManager is the class that control gameplay state.
GameScene
GameScene class is a JavaFx Scene that is created for the gameplay state (after you press start button in EnterNameScene).
GameSubScene
GameSubScene class is a JavaFx SubScene class that will be called to initialize SubScenes in Main Menu, such as about us, leaderboard, How to play.
HowToPlayBox
HowToPlayerBox is a JavaFx StackPane with a specific String to be add to itself in order to show player how to play the game.
HurtPlatform
HurtPlatform is a class to a special block that can hurt player from a normal block.
ImageButton
This ImageButton class extend ImageView.
ImageButtonType
This enum represents all the types of ImageButton
ImageNotFoundException
This ImageNotFoundException class extends from the Exception class.
Jumpable
Jumpable is a marker interface that tells which character can jump.
LeaderBoard
public class LeaderBoard is the utility class that contains useful static method used in game's leaderboard management.
Level
A public class that contain all levels.
LevelEndingBox
LevelEndingBox extends AnchorPane is class of level ending user interface which are the level completed and level failed.
LevelEndingType
enum LevelEndingType represents two the level ending type which are FAILED and COMPLETED.
Main
Main class of the game.
MainButton
MainButton class extends from Button.
MoneyBox
class MoneyBox extends StackPane is a box containing moneyTag which is a picture and moneyLabel which show the player's coin.
Movable
Movable is a marker interface that tells which character can move.
NameInputUtility
This public class is an utility that provides useful static methods to handle user's text input to be in the correct format
PauseGameLeaderBox
PauseGameLeaderBox is a JavaFx StackPane that will be shown when player click pause button while playing in any level of the game.
Player
Player class is a class that can be used to initialize player in gameplay state (the player that you control).
PlayerStat
An public class of PlayerStat that implements Comparable to custom its comparator
RenderableHolder
RenderableHolder is a static class that hold all shared images and ImageView's objects.
ShopItem
This ShopItem class of shopping items in ShopeItemBox which builded in ShopPane.
ShopItemBox
ShopItemBox extends StackPane is a box containing item in ShopPane
ShopManager
This public ShopManager class is providing useful public static method for logic and utility of shop and buying item management
ShopPane
ShopPane extends AnchorPane is class of shop user interface.
SpecialPlatform
SpecialPlatform is a class that is almost the same as JavaFx ImageView but width different name and Marker Interfaces.
SpriteAnimation
SpriteAnimation extends Transition class is used to make something moving with its own time.
ViewManager
ViewManager is the class that control the first state of the game that you know as Main Menu.
WrongFormatPlayerNameException
This WrongFormatPlayerNameException class is extends from the Exception class It is thrown in InputNameUtility class to handle Wrong format of name input.
